Uses of Package
org.fcrepo.kernel

  • Packages that use org.fcrepo.kernel 
    Package Description
    org.fcrepo.auth.roles.common  
    org.fcrepo.http.api.url  
    org.fcrepo.http.commons
    Common abstractions for module's sub-packages.
    org.fcrepo.http.commons.api.rdf  
    org.fcrepo.kernel
    This package contains abstractions for FedoraResource types and some types and functionality for Transactions.
    org.fcrepo.kernel.services  
    org.fcrepo.serialization
    This package provides serialization capability.
    org.fcrepo.syndication
    This package provides web syndication capability.
    org.fcrepo.transform.http
    RESTful interface
    org.fcrepo.webhooks
    This package provides functionality for managing web hooks.

    FedoraResource

  • Classes in org.fcrepo.kernel used by org.fcrepo.kernel 
    Class and Description
    FedoraObject
    An abstraction that represents a Fedora Object backed by a JCR node.

    Common behaviors across FedoraObject and Datastream types; also used when the exact type of an object is irrelevant
    Transaction.State
    Information about the state of the transaction
  • Classes in org.fcrepo.kernel used by org.fcrepo.kernel.services 
    Class and Description
    Datastream
    Abstraction for a Fedora datastream backed by a JCR node.
    FedoraObject
    An abstraction that represents a Fedora Object backed by a JCR node.
    FedoraResource
    Common behaviors across FedoraObject and Datastream types; also used when the exact type of an object is irrelevant
    Transaction
    A Fedora Transaction wraps a JCR session with some expiration logic.
